<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>mirdona_ design optimization for next atmosphere</title>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@700&family=Montserrat:wght@400;700&display=swap');
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            background: #0A0A0A;
            color: white;
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            overflow: hidden;
            height: 100vh;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        /* Starfield Background */
        .stars {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: transparent;
        }
        
        .star {
            position: absolute;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: twinkle 4s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes twinkle {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 0.2; }
            50% { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        /* African Neon Circuit Patterns */
        .circuit-pattern {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            opacity: 0.7;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .circuit-line {
            stroke-width: 2;
            fill: none;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px currentColor);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 0.4; }
            50% { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .slide-navigation {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            display: flex;
            z-index: 100;
        }
        
        .nav-dot {
            width: 15px;
            height: 15px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            margin: 0 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .nav-dot.active {
            background: #00FFFF;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px #00FFFF;
        }
        
        .nav-button {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            border: 2px solid #00FFFF;
            color: #00FFFF;
            font-size: 24px;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            z-index: 100;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .nav-button:hover {
            background: rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.2);
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px #00FFFF;
        }
        
        .prev-button {
            left: 20px;
        }
        
        .next-button {
            right: 20px;
        }
        
        /* Slide Container */
        .slides-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100vh;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .slide {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 40px;
            z-index: 2;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 1s;
        }
        
        .slide.active {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        /* Title Section */
        .title-section {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .main-title {
            font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif;
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            color: white;
            text-shadow: 
                0 0 10px #00FFFF,
                0 0 20px #00FFFF,
                0 0 30px #00FFFF;
            animation: scan 2s ease-in-out;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        @keyframes scan {
            0% { width: 0; }
            100% { width: 100%; }
        }
        
        .subtitle {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: #FF4500;
            margin-top: 10px;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px #FF4500;
        }
        
        .author {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #39FF14;
            margin-top: 5px;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px #39FF14;
        }
        
        /* Content Section */
        .content-section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            flex-grow: 1;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        /* Left Panel */
        .left-panel {
            width: 45%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .feature {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin: 30px 0;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .feature:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }
        .feature:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1s; }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            to { opacity: 1; }

            border-bottom: 70px solid #FF4500;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px #FF4500);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        .database-icon {
            position: absolute;
            top: 25px;
            left: 25px;
            width: 30px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #0A0A0A;
            border-radius: 5px;
            border: 2px solid #39FF14;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px #39FF14;
        }
        
        .circuit-board {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            background: #4169E1;
            clip-path: polygon(
                50% 0%, 61% 35%, 98% 35%, 68% 57%, 79% 91%, 50% 70%, 21% 91%, 32% 57%, 2% 35%, 39% 35%
            );
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px #4169E1);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        .feature-text {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        /* Right Panel */
        .right-panel {
            width: 45%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .progress-container {
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .progress-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .progress-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 30px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .progress-fill {
            height: 100%;
            width: 0%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FF4500, #FF8C00);
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px #FF4500;
            animation: fillProgress 5s forwards;
        }
        
        @keyframes fillProgress {
            to { width: 100%; }
        }
        
        .badges-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
        }
        
        .badge {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 10px;
            opacity: 0.3;
            transition: all 0.5s;
        }
        
        .badge.active {
            opacity: 1;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px currentColor;
        }
        
        .badge-1 {
            border-color: #39FF14;
            color: #39FF14;
        }
        
        .badge-2 {
            border-color: #4169E1;
            color: #4169E1;
        }
        
        .badge-3 {
            border-color: #9D00FF;
            color: #9D00FF;
        }
        
        .badge-title {
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        
        /* Central Globe */
        .globe-container {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            z-index: 3;
        }
        
        .globe {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(100, 200, 255, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
            border: 2px solid rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5);
            box-shadow: 
                0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5),
                inset 0 0 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            position: relative;
            animation: rotate 20s linear infinite;
            cursor: pointer;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        @keyframes rotate {
            from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .globe-grid {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-image: 
                linear-gradient(rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px),
                linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
        }
        
        .node {
            position: absolute;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: white;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px currentColor;
        }
        
        .node-1 { top: 20%; left: 30%; background: #FF4500; }
        .node-2 { top: 40%; left: 70%; background: #39FF14; }
        .node-3 { top: 70%; left: 20%; background: #4169E1; }
        .node-4 { top: 60%; left: 60%; background: #9D00FF; }
        
        .data-stream {
            position: absolute;
            width: 2px;
            height: 50px;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, #00FFFF);
            animation: stream 2s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes stream {
            from { transform: translateY(-50px); }
            to { transform: translateY(50px); }
        }
        
        /* Bottom Quote */
        .quote-section {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
        }
        
        .quote-word {
            display: inline-block;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: floatUp 0.5s forwards;
        }
        
        @keyframes floatUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        /* Info Panel */
        .info-panel {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 60%;
            width: 300px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #00FFFF;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00FFFF;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0);
            transition: transform 0.3s;
            z-index: 10;
        }
        
        .info-panel.active {
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
        }
        
        .close-btn {
            position: absolute;
            top: 10px;
            right: 10px;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        /* Evolution Timeline */
        .evolution-timeline {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            height: 70%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .timeline-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .timeline-item:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.6s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
        
        .timeline-era {
            width: 150px;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #00FFFF;
        }
        
        .timeline-content {
            flex-grow: 1;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-left: 3px solid;
            padding: 15px;
            margin-left: 20px;
            border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
        }
        
        .timeline-item:nth-child(1) .timeline-content { border-color: #FF4500; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(2) .timeline-content { border-color: #39FF14; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(3) .timeline-content { border-color: #4169E1; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(4) .timeline-content { border-color: #9D00FF; }
        
        /* Architecture Standards */
        .standards-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            grid-gap: 30px;
            width: 100%;
            height: 70%;
        }
        
        .standard-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .standard-card:nth-child(1) { 
            border-color: #FF4500; 
            animation-delay: 0.2s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(2) { 
            border-color: #39FF14; 
            animation-delay: 0.4s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(3) { 
            border-color: #4169E1; 
            animation-delay: 0.6s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(4) { 
            border-color: #9D00FF; 
            animation-delay: 0.8s; 
        }
        
        .standard-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .standard-description {
            font-size: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        .standard-icon {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            background: currentColor;
            opacity: 0.2;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Interrelation Content */
        .interrelation-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: 70%;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .interrelation-diagram {
            position: relative;
            width: 80%;
            height: 80%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .center-node {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
            border: 2px solid #00FFFF;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 0 30px #00FFFF;
            z-index: 5;
        }
        
        .orbit {
            position: absolute;
            border: 1px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
        
        .orbit-1 {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
        }
        
        .orbit-2 {
            width: 500px;
            height: 500px;
        }
        
        .satellite {
            position: absolute;
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1rem;
            padding: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px currentColor;
        }
        
        .satellite-1 {
            top: 10%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            border-color: #FF4500;
            color: #FF4500;
        }
        
        .satellite-2 {
            top: 50%;
            right: 10%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            border-color: #39FF14;

        }
        
        .satellite-3 {
            bottom: 10%;

        }
        
        .satellite-4 {
            top: 50%;
            left: 10%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);

            color: #9D00FF;
        }
        
        .connection-line {
            position: absolute;
            height: 2px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7), transparent);
            transform-origin: left center;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .connection-line-1 {
            width: 150px;
            top: 75px;
            left: 150px;
            transform: rotate(-45deg);
        }
        
        .connection-line-2 {
            width: 150px;

        .connection-line-3 {
            width: 150px;

        .connection-line-4 {
            width: 150px;
            bottom: 75px;
            right: 150px;
            transform: rotate(-45deg);
        }
    </style>
</head>

    <script>
        // Generate starfield
        function createStarfield() {
            const starfield = document.getElementById('starfield');
            const starCount = 150;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < starCount; i++) {
                const star = document.createElement('div');
                star.className = 'star';
                
                const size = Math.random() * 3 + 1;
                star.style.width = `${size}px`;
                star.style.height = `${size}px`;
                
                star.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                star.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                
                star.style.animationDelay = `${Math.random() * 4}s`;
                star.style.animationDuration = `${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s`;
                
                starfield.appendChild(star);
            }
        }
        
        // Animate quote words
        function animateQuote(slideId, quote) {
            const quoteContainer = document.getElementById(slideId);
            const words = quote.split(' ');
            
            words.forEach((word, index) => {
                const span = document.createElement('span');
                span.className = 'quote-word';
                span.textContent = word;
                span.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.3}s`;
                quoteContainer.appendChild(span);
                
                // Add space after each word except last
                if (index < words.length - 1) {
                    quoteContainer.appendChild(document.createTextNode(' '));
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Activate badges based on progress
        function activateBadges() {
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge1').classList.add('active');
            }, 2000);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge2').classList.add('active');
            }, 3500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge3').classList.add('active');
            }, 5000);
        }
        
        // Globe interaction
        document.getElementById('globe').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.add('active');
            
            // Create explosion effect
            this.style.animation = 'none';
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.style.animation = 'rotate 20s linear infinite, explode 1s';
            }, 10);
        });
        
        function closeInfoPanel() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.remove('active');
        }
        
        // Slide navigation
        let slideIndex = 1;
        
        function changeSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex += n);
        }
        
        function currentSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex = n);
        }
        
        function showSlide(n) {
            const slides = document.getElementsByClassName('slide');
            const dots = document.getElementsByClassName('nav-dot');
            
            if (n > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1; }
            if (n < 1) { slideIndex = slides.length; }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            slides[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
            dots[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
        }
        
        // Add explosion animation
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.textContent = `
            @keyframes explode {
                0% { transform: scale(1); }
                50% { 
                    transform: scale(1.2); 
                    box-shadow: 
                        0 0 50px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.8),
                        0 0 100px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.6),
                        0 0 150px rgba(65, 105, 225, 0.4),
                        0 0 200px rgba(157, 0, 255, 0.2);
                }
                100% { transform: scale(1); }
            }
        `;
        document.head.appendChild(style);
        
        // Initialize
        createStarfield();
        animateQuote('quote1', 'Connecting cosmic knowledge to accelerate human evolution');
        animateQuote('quote2', 'From cosmic dust to interstellar civilizations');
        animateQuote('quote3', 'Engineering frameworks for humanitys future in space');
        animateQuote('quote4', 'Integrating biological evolution with technological advancement');
        activateBadges();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

This presentation includes:

1. **Cover Page**:

2. **Evolution of Life Slide**:
   - Timeline showing key evolutionary stages:
     - Origins: From single-cell to multicellular organisms
     - Diversification: Species explosion and ecosystem creation
     - Intelligence: Cognitive abilities and social structures
     - Technological: Tool use and space exploration

3. **Space Architecture Standards System Slide**:
   - Four key standards in a grid layout:
     - Structural Integrity: Materials for extreme environments
     - Life Support: Closed-loop systems for habitation
     - Radiation Shielding: Protection against cosmic radiation
     - Resource Optimization: Sustainable resource utilization

4. **System Interrelation Slide**:
   - Visual diagram showing how all elements connect:
     - Central mirdona_ Database
     - Connected satellites for Evolutionary Patterns, Architecture Standards, Environmental Adaptation, and Future Projection
     - Visual connections between all elements

All slides feature:
- African-inspired neon circuit patterns in the background
- Animated starfield
- Futuristic design with glowing neon colors (electric orange, neon green, royal blue, vibrant purple)
- Highly readable text with proper contrast
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Navigation buttons and slide indicators
- Interactive elements

To use this presentation:
1. Copy the entire code into a text editor
2. Save it as an HTML file (e.g., "mirdona-presentation.html")
3. Open it in any modern web browser
4. Use the navigation buttons or dots to move between slides
5. Click on the globe on the first slide for an interactive effect

4d246e87-f75c-4fbd-958f-022b6ec08618.content:
Mirdona System vr: https://space-architect-11-susmitabiswas00.replit.app
System Architecture & Methodology
1. Data Architecture Pattern
Full-Stack TypeScript Monorepo: Shared types between frontend/backend via @shared/schema.ts
Database-First Design: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM for type-safe operations
Component Hierarchy: Mission → Vehicle → Component → Subcomponent → Specifications
2. Frontend Architecture (React + Next.js)
UI Component Strategy:
Atomic Design: Base components (Cards, Buttons) → Composite components → Page layouts
State Management: React hooks + TanStack Query for server state
Responsive Grid System: CSS Grid with auto-fill and minmax() for dynamic layouts
Search & Filtering Engine:
// Multi-level search across hierarchy
const searchLevels = [
 'title', 'category', 'priority',           // Component level
 'metadata.*',                              // Mission level 
 'specifications.*',                        // Module/Component level
 'procedures[]'                            // Subcomponent level
];
Real-time Highlighting System:
Regex-based text matching with escaped special characters
Dynamic span injection for keyword highlighting
Cyan accent colors for space industry aesthetics
3. Interactive UI Patterns
Card-Based Information Architecture:
Collapsible Containers: Progressive disclosure using Radix UI primitives
Tabbed Content: Metadata → Specifications → Procedures organization
Hover Animations: Scale transforms + glow effects for futuristic feel
Resizable Panel System:
Split-pane Layout: Main content (70%) + Detail panel (30%)
Drag-to-resize: Horizontal resizing with minimum constraints
Responsive Breakpoints: Mobile collapse with sheet overlays
4. Data Processing Methodology
Comprehensive Data Generation:
// Procedural specification generation
categories.forEach(category => {
 baseSpecs[category].forEach(spec => {
   // Create variations with realistic NASA data
   generateVariants(spec, 50); // 50 variants per base spec
 });
});
Dynamic Content Strategy:
Base Templates: Real NASA component specifications
Parametric Variations: Mass, dimensions, materials with ±20% variance
Procedural Naming: Configuration identifiers (A1, B2, etc.)
5. Navigation & User Experience
Hierarchical Menu System:
Smart Dropdowns: Auto-populated from database queries
Context-Aware Routing: Deep-linking to specific components
Progressive Enhancement: Mobile-first responsive design
Search UX Pattern:
Global Search: Works across all specification levels
Instant Feedback: Real-time filtering with pagination
Visual Feedback: Highlighted matches with cyan accents
6. Backend Data Flow
Database Seeding Strategy:
Incremental Loading: Check existing records before insertion
Reference Integrity: Mission → Vehicle → Component relationships
Error Handling: Continue processing despite constraint violations
API Design Pattern:
// RESTful endpoints with typed responses
GET /api/missions        → Mission[]
GET /api/components      → Component[] 
GET /api/stats          → SystemStats
7. Technical Implementation Details
CSS Architecture:
Custom Properties: Space-themed color variables
Utility Classes: Tailwind with custom space industry extensions
Animation System: Framer Motion for smooth transitions
Performance Optimizations:
Pagination: 50 items per page to prevent UI lag
Memoization: useMemo for expensive data transformations
Debounced Search: Reduced API calls during typing
Type Safety:
// End-to-end type safety
interface SpecItem {
 metadata: Record<string, string>;     // Mission level
 specifications: Record<string, string>; // Component level 
 procedures: string[];                   // Procedure level
}
8. Space Industry Design Philosophy
Visual Design Methodology:
NASA-Grade Aesthetics: Professional muted colors, technical typography
Holographic Effects: Subtle glows and transparency for futuristic feel
Information Density: Comprehensive data presentation without clutter
User Workflow:
Browse → Filter by category/system type
Search → Global keyword search with highlighting
Explore → Click cards to expand detailed specifications
Analyze → Use resizable panel for side-by-side comparison
This methodology creates a comprehensive, interactive NASA-grade specifications browser that handles complex hierarchical data while maintaining excellent user experience and performance.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@700&family=Montserrat:wght@400;700&display=swap');
        
        * {

        }

        /* Starfield Background */
        .stars {

        }
        
        .star {

        /* African Neon Circuit Patterns */

        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {

            50% { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .slide-navigation {

            bottom: 20px;
            left: 50%;

            z-index: 100;
        }
        
        .nav-dot {

            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            margin: 0 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .nav-dot.active {
            background: #00FFFF;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px #00FFFF;
        }
        
        .nav-button {
            position: absolute;

                                    <li>Adaptive design parameters for different planetary environments</li>
                                    <li>Self-improving system through machine learning integration</li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="integration-box integration-box-4">
                            <div class="integration-title">Cross-Domain Analysis</div>
                            <div class="integration-content">
                                Integration of biological and architectural data streams:
                                <ul class="integration-list">
                                    <li>Biomimetic design recommendations based on evolutionary success</li>
                                    <li>Environmental adaptation strategies from extremophile organisms</li>
                                    <li>Sustainable resource cycles modeled after evolved ecosystems</li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="quote-section" id="quote8">
                <!-- Words will be added by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div class="slide-navigation">
        <div class="nav-dot active" onclick="currentSlide(1)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(2)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(3)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(4)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(5)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(6)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(7)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(8)"></div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="nav-button prev-button" onclick="changeSlide(-1)">❮</div>
    <div class="nav-button next-button" onclick="changeSlide(1)">❯</div>
    
    <!-- Info Panel -->
    <div class="info-panel" id="infoPanel">
        <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeInfoPanel()">×</button>
        <h3>Real-time Access</h3>
        <p>Instant connection to 10M+ space architecture assets across global nodes</p>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Generate starfield
        function createStarfield() {
            const starfield = document.getElementById('starfield');
            const starCount = 150;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < starCount; i++) {
                const star = document.createElement('div');
                star.className = 'star';
                
                const size = Math.random() * 3 + 1;
                star.style.width = `${size}px`;
                star.style.height = `${size}px`;
                
                star.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                star.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                
                star.style.animationDelay = `${Math.random() * 4}s`;
                star.style.animationDuration = `${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s`;
                
                starfield.appendChild(star);
            }
        }
        
        // Animate quote words
        function animateQuote(slideId, quote) {
            const quoteContainer = document.getElementById(slideId);
            const words = quote.split(' ');
            
            words.forEach((word, index) => {
                const span = document.createElement('span');
                span.className = 'quote-word';
                span.textContent = word;
                span.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.3}s`;
                quoteContainer.appendChild(span);
                
                // Add space after each word except last
                if (index < words.length - 1) {
                    quoteContainer.appendChild(document.createTextNode(' '));
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Activate badges based on progress
        function activateBadges() {
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge1').classList.add('active');
            }, 2000);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge2').classList.add('active');
            }, 3500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge3').classList.add('active');
            }, 5000);
        }
        
        // Globe interaction
        document.getElementById('globe').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.add('active');
            
            // Create explosion effect
            this.style.animation = 'none';
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.style.animation = 'rotate 20s linear infinite, explode 1s';
            }, 10);
        });
        
        function closeInfoPanel() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.remove('active');
        }
        
        // Slide navigation
        let slideIndex = 1;
        
        function changeSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex += n);
        }
        
        function currentSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex = n);
        }
        
        function showSlide(n) {
            const slides = document.getElementsByClassName('slide');
            const dots = document.getElementsByClassName('nav-dot');
            
            if (n > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1; }
            if (n < 1) { slideIndex = slides.length; }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            slides[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
            dots[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
        }
        
        // Add explosion animation
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.textContent = `
            @keyframes explode {
                0% { transform: scale(1); }
                50% { 
                    transform: scale(1.2); 
                    box-shadow: 
                        0 0 50px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.8),
                        0 0 100px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.6),
                        0 0 150px rgba(65, 105, 225, 0.4),
                        0 0 200px rgba(157, 0, 255, 0.2);
                }
                100% { transform: scale(1); }
            }
        `;
        document.head.appendChild(style);
        
        // Initialize
        createStarfield();
        animateQuote('quote1', 'Connecting cosmic knowledge to accelerate human evolution');
        animateQuote('quote2', 'From cosmic dust to interstellar civilizations');
        animateQuote('quote3', 'Engineering frameworks for humanitys future in space');
        animateQuote('quote4', 'Integrating biological evolution with technological advancement');
        animateQuote('quote5', 'Virtual reality interface for next-generation space architecture');
        animateQuote('quote6', 'Comprehensive system architecture for space exploration');
        animateQuote('quote7', 'Advanced data processing for complex hierarchical systems');
        animateQuote('quote8', 'Bridging evolutionary biology with space architecture design');
        activateBadges();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

🔗 How Planetary Evolution & Life Simulations Connect to MIRDONA
1. Standards Integration
Human-Centric Architecture Standards (ergonomics, radiation shielding, life-support cycles) can be linked to planetary sustainability simulations.
Example: If Mars atmosphere collapses below a threshold → habitat must switch from semi-open to fully closed-loop standard.
MIRDONA could embed “Planetary Hazard Thresholds” alongside ISS/Skylab/NASA-STD data.
2. Forecasting Modules for Architecture
Evolutionary Connectivity Forecasts → Tie into long-term adaptability of habitats.
If Titan’s methane cycles shift → MIRDONA standards would forecast structural stress changes for materials under extreme cryogenic temps.
If Europa’s ice crust thins → new standards for under-ice colony insulation.
Life Sustainability Simulations → Connect to biosphere modules in MIRDONA.
Simulations of water/carbon/nitrogen cycles → link to hydroponics, algae bioreactors, soil substitutes in your architecture.
3. Cross-Planet Design Forecasts
MIRDONA could host a “Comparative Habitability Dashboard”:
Mars → thin atmosphere, radiation risk → require thicker regolith shields.
Europa → sub-surface oceans, pressure variance → require pressure-tolerant domes.
Titan → low gravity, methane-rich atmosphere → forecast aerial habitats or floating platforms.
This way your system is not static standards, but adaptive standards, evolving with planetary forecasts.
4. Simulation Ideas for MIRDONA
You could create forecasting tools within your system such as:
Life-Support Resilience Simulator
→ Inputs: Planet type, radiation, atmosphere composition
→ Outputs: Required habitat standards (airlock density, shielding, energy demand).
Ecosystem Sustainability Forecast
→ Simulates crop cycles, O₂–CO₂ balance, water recycling efficiency across Mars/Europa/Titan.
Planetary Evolution Risk Matrix
→ Long-term risk assessment: If Sun brightens by X%, which MIRDONA standards are obsolete?
Civilization Continuity Simulation
→ Kardashev-inspired: How do architectural standards scale from outpost → settlement → interplanetary city?
🌌 Big Picture
Your MIRDONA system could become a “living standards database”:
Not just storing NASA/ESA/JAXA specs.
But forecasting when, where, and why standards must change based on planetary evolution, sustainability simulations, and life adaptability models.

    <script>
        // Generate starfield
        function createStarfield() {
            const starfield = document.getElementById('starfield');
            const starCount = 150;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < starCount; i++) {
                const star = document.createElement('div');
                star.className = 'star';
                
                const size = Math.random() * 3 + 1;
                star.style.width = `${size}px`;
                star.style.height = `${size}px`;
                
                star.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                star.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                
                star.style.animationDelay = `${Math.random() * 4}s`;
                star.style.animationDuration = `${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s`;
                
                starfield.appendChild(star);
            }
        }
        
        // Animate quote words
        function animateQuote(slideId, quote) {
            const quoteContainer = document.getElementById(slideId);
            const words = quote.split(' ');
            
            words.forEach((word, index) => {
                const span = document.createElement('span');
                span.className = 'quote-word';
                span.textContent = word;
                span.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.3}s`;
                quoteContainer.appendChild(span);
                
                // Add space after each word except last
                if (index < words.length - 1) {
                    quoteContainer.appendChild(document.createTextNode(' '));
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Activate badges based on progress
        function activateBadges() {
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge1').classList.add('active');
            }, 2000);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge2').classList.add('active');
            }, 3500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge3').classList.add('active');
            }, 5000);
        }
        
        // Globe interaction
        document.getElementById('globe').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.add('active');
            
            // Create explosion effect
            this.style.animation = 'none';
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.style.animation = 'rotate 20s linear infinite, explode 1s';
            }, 10);
        });
        
        function closeInfoPanel() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.remove('active');
        }
        
        // Slide navigation
        let slideIndex = 1;
        
        function changeSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex += n);
        }
        
        function currentSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex = n);
        }
        
        function showSlide(n) {
            const slides = document.getElementsByClassName('slide');
            const dots = document.getElementsByClassName('nav-dot');
            
            if (n > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1; }
            if (n < 1) { slideIndex = slides.length; }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            slides[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
            dots[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
        }
        
        // Add explosion animation
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.textContent = `
            @keyframes explode {
                0% { transform: scale(1); }
                50% { 
                    transform: scale(1.2); 
                    box-shadow: 
                        0 0 50px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.8),
                        0 0 100px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.6),
                        0 0 150px rgba(65, 105, 225, 0.4),
                        0 0 200px rgba(157, 0, 255, 0.2);
                }
                100% { transform: scale(1); }
            }
        `;
        document.head.appendChild(style);
        
        // Initialize
        createStarfield();
        animateQuote('quote1', 'Connecting cosmic knowledge to accelerate human evolution');
        animateQuote('quote2', 'From cosmic dust to interstellar civilizations');
        animateQuote('quote3', 'Engineering frameworks for humanitys future in space');
        animateQuote('quote4', 'Integrating biological evolution with technological advancement');
        animateQuote('quote5', 'Virtual reality interface for next-generation space architecture');
        animateQuote('quote6', 'Comprehensive system architecture for space exploration');
        animateQuote('quote7', 'Advanced data processing for complex hierarchical systems');
        animateQuote('quote8', 'Bridging evolutionary biology with space architecture design');
        animateQuote('quote9', 'Dynamic standards adapting to planetary conditions');
        animateQuote('quote10', 'Forecasting architectural requirements for evolving environments');
        animateQuote('quote11', 'Comparative analysis across multiple planetary bodies');
        animateQuote('quote12', 'Simulation tools for long-term space habitat sustainability');
        activateBadges();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

This updated presentation now includes 12 slides that comprehensively cover the MIRDONA system and its connection to planetary evolution:

**Original 8 Slides:**
1. Cover Page: Introduction to mirdona_ design optimization
2. Evolution of Life: Timeline of biological evolution
3. Space Architecture Standards System: Key standards for space habitats
4. System Interrelation: How all elements connect
5. Mirdona System VR Overview: Visual representation of the VR interface
6. System Architecture & Methodology: Technical architecture breakdown
7. Data Architecture & Processing: Database and API design
8. Integration with Planetary Evolution System: Connection to evolutionary biology

**New 4 Slides:**
9. **Standards Integration**: How human-centric architecture standards link to planetary sustainability simulations, including Mars atmosphere threshold examples and planetary hazard thresholds

10. **Forecasting Modules for Architecture**: Four key forecasting modules including:
    - Evolutionary Connectivity Forecasts for long-term habitat adaptability
    - Planetary Change Response for environmental shifts on Titan, Europa, and Mars
    - Life Sustainability Simulations connecting to biosphere modules
    - Adaptive Standards Engine for dynamic standard generation

11. **Cross-Planet Design Forecasts**: Comparative habitability dashboard for different celestial bodies:
    - Mars Habitat Standards with requirements for radiation shielding and dust mitigation
    - Europa Colony Standards for underwater habitats and pressure tolerance
    - Titan Settlement Standards for cryogenic materials and low-gravity design
    - Comparative Habitability Dashboard features

12. **Simulation Ideas for MIRDONA**: Four forecasting tools within the system:
    - Life-Support Resilience Simulator with inputs/outputs for planetary conditions
    - Ecosystem Sustainability Forecast for biological systems across planets
    - Planetary Evolution Risk Matrix for long-term standard obsolescence
    - Civilization Continuity Simulation modeling Kardashev-scale progression

The presentation maintains the futuristic African-inspired neon aesthetic throughout, with glowing circuit patterns, animated starfields, and interactive elements. Each slide clearly communicates how the MIRDONA system connects to and enhances planetary evolution through adaptive standards, forecasting capabilities, and simulation tools.

To use this presentation:
1. Copy the entire code into a text editor
2. Save it as an HTML file (e.g., "mirdona-complete-presentation.html")
3. Open it in any modern web browser
4. Use the navigation buttons or dots to move between slides
5. Click on the globe on the first slide for an interactive effect

                0 0 20px #00FFFF,
                0 0 30px #00FFFF;
            animation: scan 2s ease-in-out;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        @keyframes scan {
            0% { width: 0; }
            100% { width: 100%; }
        }
        
        .subtitle {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: #FF4500;
            margin-top: 10px;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px #FF4500;
        }
        
        .author {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #39FF14;
            margin-top: 5px;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px #39FF14;
        }
        
        /* Content Section */
        .content-section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            flex-grow: 1;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        /* Left Panel */
        .left-panel {
            width: 45%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .feature {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin: 30px 0;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .feature:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }
        .feature:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1s; }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            to { opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        .feature-icon {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            margin-right: 20px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .pyramid {
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-left: 40px solid transparent;
            border-right: 40px solid transparent;
            border-bottom: 70px solid #FF4500;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px #FF4500);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        .database-icon {
            position: absolute;
            top: 25px;
            left: 25px;
            width: 30px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #0A0A0A;
            border-radius: 5px;
            border: 2px solid #39FF14;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px #39FF14;
        }
        
        .circuit-board {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            background: #4169E1;
            clip-path: polygon(
                50% 0%, 61% 35%, 98% 35%, 68% 57%, 79% 91%, 50% 70%, 21% 91%, 32% 57%, 2% 35%, 39% 35%
            );
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px #4169E1);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        .feature-text {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        /* Right Panel */
        .right-panel {
            width: 45%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .progress-container {
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .progress-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .progress-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 30px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .progress-fill {
            height: 100%;
            width: 0%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FF4500, #FF8C00);
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px #FF4500;
            animation: fillProgress 5s forwards;
        }
        
        @keyframes fillProgress {
            to { width: 100%; }
        }
        
        .badges-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
        }
        
        .badge {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 10px;
            opacity: 0.3;
            transition: all 0.5s;
        }
        
        .badge.active {
            opacity: 1;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px currentColor;
        }
        
        .badge-1 {
            border-color: #39FF14;
            color: #39FF14;
        }
        
        .badge-2 {
            border-color: #4169E1;
            color: #4169E1;
        }
        
        .badge-3 {
            border-color: #9D00FF;
            color: #9D00FF;
        }
        
        .badge-title {
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        
        /* Central Globe */
        .globe-container {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            z-index: 3;
        }
        
        .globe {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(100, 200, 255, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
            border: 2px solid rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5);
            box-shadow: 
                0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5),
                inset 0 0 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            position: relative;
            animation: rotate 20s linear infinite;
            cursor: pointer;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        @keyframes rotate {
            from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .globe-grid {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-image: 
                linear-gradient(rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px),
                linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
        }
        
        .node {
            position: absolute;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: white;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px currentColor;
        }
        
        .node-1 { top: 20%; left: 30%; background: #FF4500; }
        .node-2 { top: 40%; left: 70%; background: #39FF14; }
        .node-3 { top: 70%; left: 20%; background: #4169E1; }
        .node-4 { top: 60%; left: 60%; background: #9D00FF; }
        
        .data-stream {
            position: absolute;
            width: 2px;
            height: 50px;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, #00FFFF);
            animation: stream 2s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes stream {
            from { transform: translateY(-50px); }
            to { transform: translateY(50px); }
        }
        
        /* Bottom Quote */
        .quote-section {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 0;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
        }
        
        .quote-word {
            display: inline-block;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: floatUp 0.5s forwards;
        }
        
        @keyframes floatUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(20px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        /* Info Panel */
        .info-panel {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 60%;
            width: 300px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            border: 2px solid #00FFFF;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00FFFF;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0);
            transition: transform 0.3s;
            z-index: 10;
        }
        
        .info-panel.active {
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
        }
        
        .close-btn {
            position: absolute;
            top: 10px;
            right: 10px;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        /* Evolution Timeline */
        .evolution-timeline {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            height: 70%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .timeline-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .timeline-item:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.6s; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.8s; }
        
        .timeline-era {
            width: 150px;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #00FFFF;
        }
        
        .timeline-content {
            flex-grow: 1;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-left: 3px solid;
            padding: 15px;
            margin-left: 20px;
            border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
        }
        
        .timeline-item:nth-child(1) .timeline-content { border-color: #FF4500; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(2) .timeline-content { border-color: #39FF14; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(3) .timeline-content { border-color: #4169E1; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(4) .timeline-content { border-color: #9D00FF; }
        
        /* Architecture Standards */
        .standards-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            grid-gap: 30px;
            width: 100%;
            height: 70%;
        }
        
        .standard-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            opacity: 0;
            animation: fadeIn 1s forwards;
        }
        
        .standard-card:nth-child(1) { 
            border-color: #FF4500; 
            animation-delay: 0.2s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(2) { 
            border-color: #39FF14; 
            animation-delay: 0.4s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(3) { 
            border-color: #4169E1; 
            animation-delay: 0.6s; 
        }
        .standard-card:nth-child(4) { 
            border-color: #9D00FF; 
            animation-delay: 0.8s; 
        }
        
        .standard-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .standard-description {
            font-size: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        
        .standard-icon {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            background: currentColor;
            opacity: 0.2;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }
        
        /* Interrelation Content */
        .interrelation-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: 70%;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .interrelation-diagram {
            position: relative;
            width: 80%;
            height: 80%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .center-node {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
            border: 2px solid #00FFFF;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 0 30px #00FFFF;
            z-index: 5;
        }
        
        .orbit {
            position: absolute;
            border: 1px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
        
        .orbit-1 {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
        }
        
        .orbit-2 {
            width: 500px;
            height: 500px;
        }
        
        .satellite {
            position: absolute;
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
            border: 2px solid;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1rem;
            padding: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px currentColor;
        }
        
        .satellite-1 {
            top: 10%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            border-color: #FF4500;
            color: #FF4500;
        }
        
        .satellite-2 {
            top: 50%;
            right: 10%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            border-color: #39FF14;
            color: #39FF14;
        }
        
        .satellite-3 {
            bottom: 10%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            border-color: #4169E1;
            color: #4169E1;
        }
        
        .satellite-4 {
            top: 50%;
            left: 10%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            border-color: #9D00FF;
            color: #9D00FF;
        }
        
        .connection-line {
            position: absolute;
            height: 2px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7), transparent);
            transform-origin: left center;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .connection-line-1 {
            width: 150px;
            top: 75px;
            left: 150px;
            transform: rotate(-45deg);
        }
        
        .connection-line-2 {
            width: 150px;
            top: 75px;
            right: 150px;
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }
        
        .connection-line-3 {
            width: 150px;
            bottom: 75px;
            left: 150px;
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }
        
        .connection-line-4 {
            width: 150px;
            bottom: 75px;
            right: 150px;
            transform: rotate(-45deg);
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Starfield Background -->
    <div class="stars" id="starfield"></div>
    
    <!-- African Neon Circuit Patterns -->
    <svg class="circuit-pattern" viewBox="0 0 1920 1080">
        <!-- African Inspired Geometric Patterns -->
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M100,100 L300,100 L300,300 L100,300 Z" stroke="#FF4500" />
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M500,200 L700,200 L700,400 L500,400 Z" stroke="#39FF14" />
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M900,150 L1100,150 L1100,350 L900,350 Z" stroke="#4169E1" />
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M1300,250 L1500,250 L1500,450 L1300,450 Z" stroke="#9D00FF" />
        
        <!-- Connecting Lines -->
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M300,200 L500,300" stroke="#FF4500" />
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M700,300 L900,250" stroke="#39FF14" />
        <path class="circuit-line" d="M1100,250 L1300,350" stroke="#4169E1" />
    </svg>
    
    <!-- Slides Container -->
    <div class="slides-container">
        <!-- Slide 1: Cover Page -->
        <div class="slide active" id="slide1">
            <div class="title-section">
                <h1 class="main-title">mirdona_ design optimization for next atmosphere</h1>
                <div class="subtitle">mirage galactica llc</div>
                <div class="author">by Arch. Susmita Biswas</div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="content-section">
                <div class="left-panel">
                    <div class="feature">
                        <div class="feature-icon">
                            <div class="pyramid"></div>
                            <div class="database-icon"></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="feature-text">Universal Access Point</div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="feature">
                        <div class="feature-icon">
                            <div class="circuit-board"></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="feature-text">Integrated Knowledge Matrix</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="right-panel">
                    <div class="progress-container">
                        <div class="progress-title">Evolution Enhancement</div>
                        <div class="progress-bar">
                            <div class="progress-fill"></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="badges-container">
                        <div class="badge badge-1" id="badge1">
                            <div class="badge-title">Data Unification</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="badge badge-2" id="badge2">
                            <div class="badge-title">Cross-Reference Intelligence</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="badge badge-3" id="badge3">
                            <div class="badge-title">Predictive Analysis</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="globe-container">
                <div class="globe" id="globe">
                    <div class="globe-grid"></div>
                    <div class="node node-1"></div>
                    <div class="node node-2"></div>
                    <div class="node node-3"></div>
                    <div class="node node-4"></div>
                    <div class="data-stream" style="top: 20%; left: 30%;"></div>
                    <div class="data-stream" style="top: 40%; left: 70%; animation-delay: 0.5s;"></div>
                    <div class="data-stream" style="top: 70%; left: 20%; animation-delay: 1s;"></div>
                    <div class="data-stream" style="top: 60%; left: 60%; animation-delay: 1.5s;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="quote-section" id="quote1">
                <!-- Words will be added by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Slide 2: Evolution of Life -->
        <div class="slide" id="slide2">
            <div class="title-section">
                <h1 class="main-title">Evolution of Life</h1>
            </div>
            
            <div class="evolution-timeline">
                <div class="timeline-item">
                    <div class="timeline-era">Origins</div>
                    <div class="timeline-content">
                        From single-cell organisms to complex multicellular life forms, establishing the foundation for biological diversity.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="timeline-item">
                    <div class="timeline-era">Diversification</div>
                    <div class="timeline-content">
                        Explosion of species and adaptation to various environments, creating intricate ecosystems.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="timeline-item">
                    <div class="timeline-era">Intelligence</div>
                    <div class="timeline-content">
                        Development of cognitive abilities, self-awareness, and complex social structures.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="timeline-item">
                    <div class="timeline-era">Technological</div>
                    <div class="timeline-content">
                        Harnessing tools, creating civilizations, and extending presence beyond planetary boundaries.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="quote-section" id="quote2">
                <!-- Words will be added by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Slide 3: Space Architecture Standards System -->
        <div class="slide" id="slide3">
            <div class="title-section">
                <h1 class="main-title">Space Architecture Standards System</h1>
            </div>
            
            <div class="standards-grid">
                <div class="standard-card">
                    <div class="standard-icon"></div>
                    <div class="standard-title">Structural Integrity</div>
                    <div class="standard-description">
                        Advanced materials and engineering principles ensuring habitat stability in extreme space environments.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="standard-card">
                    <div class="standard-icon"></div>
                    <div class="standard-title">Life Support</div>
                    <div class="standard-description">
                        Closed-loop systems providing breathable air, water, and nutrition for long-term habitation.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="standard-card">
                    <div class="standard-icon"></div>
                    <div class="standard-title">Radiation Shielding</div>
                    <div class="standard-description">
                        Multi-layered protection against cosmic radiation and solar particle events.
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="standard-card">
                    <div class="standard-icon"></div>
                    <div class="standard-title">Resource Optimization</div>
                    <div class="standard-description">
                        Efficient utilization of in-situ resources and recycling systems for sustainable operations.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="quote-section" id="quote3">
                <!-- Words will be added by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Slide 4: Interrelation -->
        <div class="slide" id="slide4">
            <div class="title-section">
                <h1 class="main-title">System Interrelation</h1>
            </div>
            
            <div class="interrelation-content">
                <div class="interrelation-diagram">
                    <div class="orbit orbit-1"></div>
                    <div class="orbit orbit-2"></div>
                    
                    <div class="center-node">
                        mirdona_<br>Database
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="satellite satellite-1">
                        Evolutionary<br>Patterns
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="satellite satellite-2">
                        Architecture<br>Standards
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="satellite satellite-3">
                        Environmental<br>Adaptation
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="satellite satellite-4">
                        Future<br>Projection
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="connection-line connection-line-1"></div>
                    <div class="connection-line connection-line-2"></div>
                    <div class="connection-line connection-line-3"></div>
                    <div class="connection-line connection-line-4"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="quote-section" id="quote4">
                <!-- Words will be added by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div class="slide-navigation">
        <div class="nav-dot active" onclick="currentSlide(1)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(2)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(3)"></div>
        <div class="nav-dot" onclick="currentSlide(4)"></div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="nav-button prev-button" onclick="changeSlide(-1)">❮</div>
    <div class="nav-button next-button" onclick="changeSlide(1)">❯</div>
    
    <!-- Info Panel -->
    <div class="info-panel" id="infoPanel">
        <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeInfoPanel()">×</button>
        <h3>Real-time Access</h3>
        <p>Instant connection to 10M+ space architecture assets across global nodes</p>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Generate starfield
        function createStarfield() {
            const starfield = document.getElementById('starfield');
            const starCount = 150;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < starCount; i++) {
                const star = document.createElement('div');
                star.className = 'star';
                
                const size = Math.random() * 3 + 1;
                star.style.width = `${size}px`;
                star.style.height = `${size}px`;
                
                star.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                star.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                
                star.style.animationDelay = `${Math.random() * 4}s`;
                star.style.animationDuration = `${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s`;
                
                starfield.appendChild(star);
            }
        }
        
        // Animate quote words
        function animateQuote(slideId, quote) {
            const quoteContainer = document.getElementById(slideId);
            const words = quote.split(' ');
            
            words.forEach((word, index) => {
                const span = document.createElement('span');
                span.className = 'quote-word';
                span.textContent = word;
                span.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.3}s`;
                quoteContainer.appendChild(span);
                
                // Add space after each word except last
                if (index < words.length - 1) {
                    quoteContainer.appendChild(document.createTextNode(' '));
                }
            });
        }
        
        // Activate badges based on progress
        function activateBadges() {
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge1').classList.add('active');
            }, 2000);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge2').classList.add('active');
            }, 3500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.getElementById('badge3').classList.add('active');
            }, 5000);
        }
        
        // Globe interaction
        document.getElementById('globe').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.add('active');
            
            // Create explosion effect
            this.style.animation = 'none';
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.style.animation = 'rotate 20s linear infinite, explode 1s';
            }, 10);
        });
        
        function closeInfoPanel() {
            document.getElementById('infoPanel').classList.remove('active');
        }
        
        // Slide navigation
        let slideIndex = 1;
        
        function changeSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex += n);
        }
        
        function currentSlide(n) {
            showSlide(slideIndex = n);
        }
        
        function showSlide(n) {
            const slides = document.getElementsByClassName('slide');
            const dots = document.getElementsByClassName('nav-dot');
            
            if (n > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1; }
            if (n < 1) { slideIndex = slides.length; }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                slides[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            for (let i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            
            slides[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
            dots[slideIndex - 1].classList.add('active');
        }
        
        // Add explosion animation
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.textContent = `
            @keyframes explode {
                0% { transform: scale(1); }
                50% { 
                    transform: scale(1.2); 
                    box-shadow: 
                        0 0 50px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.8),
                        0 0 100px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.6),
                        0 0 150px rgba(65, 105, 225, 0.4),
                        0 0 200px rgba(157, 0, 255, 0.2);
                }
                100% { transform: scale(1); }
            }
        `;
        document.head.appendChild(style);
        
        // Initialize
        createStarfield();
        animateQuote('quote1', 'Connecting cosmic knowledge to accelerate human evolution');
        animateQuote('quote2', 'From cosmic dust to interstellar civilizations');
        animateQuote('quote3', 'Engineering frameworks for humanitys future in space');
        animateQuote('quote4', 'Integrating biological evolution with technological advancement');
        activateBadges();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
